TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ISOWeek extends System.Object
public ref class ISOWeek abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供静态成员，以支持 ISO 周日期，这是由国际标准化组织 (ISO) 发布的 ISO 8601 日期和时间标准的一部分。

span.span: Provides static members to support the ISO week date that is part of the ISO 8601 date and time standard issued by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO).

MemberSignature.Value: public static int GetWeekOfYear (DateTime date);
.method public static hidebysig int32 GetWeekOfYear(valuetype System.DateTime date) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWeekOfYear (date As DateTime) As Integer
public: static int GetWeekOfYear(DateTime date);
static member GetWeekOfYear : DateTime -> int

span.span: A date in the Gregorian calendar.

summary.span: 计算给定的公历日期的 ISO 周数。

span.span: Calculates the ISO week number of a given Gregorian date.

returns.span: 1 到 53 之间的数字表示给定的公历日期的 ISO 周数。

span.span: A number between 1 and 53 representing the ISO week number of the given Gregorian date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的 ISO 周数可以属于不同于输入公历年份的 ISO 年份。The returned ISO week number can belong to an ISO year that is different from the input Gregorian year. 例如，公历日期2005-01-01 的 ISO 周数为53，但 ISO 年份为2004。For example, the Gregorian date 2005-01-01 will have ISO week number 53 but ISO year 2004. 若要获取 ISO 周数的年份 (也称为以非正式方式) ISO 年份，请调用 To get the ISO week-numbering year (also called the ISO year informally), call

param.name: year
param.span: ISO 周编号年份（也称为非正式的 ISO 年份）。

span.span: An ISO week-numbering year (also called an ISO year informally).

summary.span: 计算给定的 ISO 周编号年份中的周数。

span.span: calculates the number of weeks in a given ISO week-numbering year.

returns.span: 一年中的 ISO 周数。

span.span: The number of ISO weeks in the year.
Returns either 52 or 53.

span.span: A date in the Gregorian calendar.

summary.span: 计算映射到输入公历日期的 ISO 周编号年份（也称为非正式的 ISO 年份）。

span.span: Calculates the ISO week-numbering year (also called ISO year informally) mapped to the input Gregorian date.

returns.span: ISO 周编号年份，介于 1 至 9999 之间

span.span: The ISO week-numbering year, between 1 and 9999

remarks.format: ## Remarks 到公历日期的 ISO 周编号的年数映射可能不同于给定公历的年份。The ISO week-numbering year number mapping to Gregorian date can be different than the year of the given Gregorian. 例如，公历日期2005-01-01 映射到 ISO 周编码年份2004。or example, the Gregorian date 2005-01-01 maps to the ISO week-numbering year 2004.

param.span: 给定的 ISO 周编号年份中的 ISO 周数。

param.span: 给定的 ISO 周内一星期中的某一天。

summary.span: 将由指定 ISO 年份、周数和星期几表示的 ISO 周日期映射到相应的公历日期。

span.span: Maps the ISO week date represented by a specified ISO year, week number, and day of week to the equivalent Gregorian date.

returns.span: 公历日期相当于输入的 ISO 周日期。

span.span: The Gregorian date equivalent to the input ISO week date.
